Description:
Alatskivi Castle is a 16th century manor thats reconstruction was finished in the 19th century for Neo-Gothic style. If offers classically furnished castle rooms, with one located on the tower. Every room features free Wi-Fi.

Every room in the castle is spacious and decorated with wood. They all feature a private bathroom with a shower.

Alatskivi Castle features a green garden and free parking. At extra charge, massage treatment is provided. Buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant.

Alatskivi Castle is surrounded by lakes, with the closest one, Alatskivi Lake, 200 metres from the castle. Peipsi Lake lies 3 km from the hotel.

Description:
Villa Andropoff is located in Pärnu region, in a green area right by Parnu Bay, just 100 metres from the beach. Free WiFi access and secured territory with free parking is available on site. Villa Andropoff is located 10 km from Pärnu city and 1,1 km from the White Beach Golf Club.

Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with free toiletries. Extras include an outdoor seating area, bed linen and a fan. Apartments come with a kitchenette.

Villa Andropoff features a 24-hour front desk, a seasonal restaurant, barbecue facilities and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a games room. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling. Massages are available at an extra charge. Please inform Villa Andropoff in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property may host on-site functions and some rooms may be affected by noise.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
You are advised to bring your own vehicle as this property is not serviced by public transport.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Please note that the restaurant is closed from October to April. Meals can be ordered in advance in this period.

Description:
Boasting garden views, Erlendi Kodumajutus features accommodation with a garden and a balcony, around 4.2 km from Lydia Koidula Memorial Museum. This property offers access to a terrace, darts, free private parking and free WiFi.

This holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home.

A childrens playground and barbecue facilities are available for guests at the holiday home to use.

Parnu Tallinn Gate is 5.7 km from Erlendi Kodumajutus, while Pärnu Museum is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lennart Meri Tallinn, 138 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Erlendi Kodumajutus in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Situated among the tranquil pine forests and lakes of Southern Estonia, the cosy and comfortable Hotel Kubija offers relaxing holidays and natural health treatments.

Guests can enjoy a wide range of classic and natural health and beauty treatments and wellness procedures, with a choice of 5 saunas and four spa baths available in the spa.

The restaurant serves traditional Estonian delicacies as well as international cuisine. In summer you can dine on the restaurants open-air terrace and enjoy the homemade bread and exquisite chocolate truffles, which are the chefs speciality.

Each room is comfortably equipped with many amenities, including free internet access and beautiful views of the forest or the lake.

In the forest near the hotel you will find both a walking track and an illuminated route for skiing or cycling.

Guests can play mini golf and then relax in the sauna. There is a special play room for children and a playground. Staff will help to organise excursions and hikes through the beautiful natural landscape around Hotel Kubija. Renovation work is done from FebruaryJuly 2023. The Clay rooms, the heating system, and the ventilation are under renovation. The property apologises for any inconvenience caused.

Description:
Surrounded by the lakes, hills and forests of the Haanja Nature Reserve, this 400-year-old manor in Southern Estonia was turned into a modern guesthouse with an integrated training and wellness centre.

Rogosi Manor offers traditional Estonian dishes, which you can enjoy in the ambience of the historic manor atmosphere.

The rooms at Rogosi Manor are simply furnished, but with attention to detail, as evidenced by the racks from the manors small carpentry. The rooms have no TVs or radios to let you enjoy a quiet, undisturbed stay.

The original natural landscape of Southern Estonia and the big distance to larger cities make a stay in this historical building from the 17th century something very special.

The surrounding landscape, close to the Latvian and Russian borders, is lightly populated and offers many cultural and natural sights. A unique attraction is the Suur munamägi, at 318 metres the highest mountain in the Baltics. The lakes are ideal for swimming and fishing. There are many hiking and cycling trails in the surrounding area. Cross-country skiing is available in the nearby Haanja ski centre. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Rogosi Külaliskorter in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Opened in 2000, this comfortable hotel offers spacious rooms and is located next to Lake Tamula and close to the city centre. Adrenaline Arena (motorsports) in Sõmerpalu is 13km away from the property.

The hotel provides cosy and modern rooms that are fully equipped with all facilities. Rooms also benefit from views of the surrounding area and the Lake.

The hotels facilities include conference and meeting facilities for up to 40 people. There is also a tennis court and sauna. The hotel also provides free parking and free internet access. Please inform Hotell Tamula in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.

Description:
Ränduri is located on Võrus main street, Jüri. It offers uniquely decorated rooms with a LED TV and free Wi-Fi. Free private parking is available on-site.

The rooms of the Ränduri are warmly decorated, with decor inspired by different countries. Each room offers a private bathroom.

There is a pub on the ground floor, which serves breakfast.

The Kagu-Keskus shopping centre and Tamula beach promenade are both is within a 5 minute walk. Võru Central Park is 500 meters from the Ränduri. The shuttle bus station is within 1 km.

Description:
Offering a restaurant, Georgi Hotell is located in a historic building in the centre of Võru, on the main street of the city. It provides free WiFi access throughout. It enjoys a location within 550 metres from Lake Tamula.

Each classically designed room here features furniture made by local artisans from natural, Estonian wood. It will provide you with air conditioning and a seating area where you can enjoy watching cable channels on an LCD TV. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include a desk.

At Georgi Hotell you will find a 24-hour front desk, beauty salon with massage, facial and body services and a restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage, ski storage and a childrens playground. A free private parking is also provided, for guests convenience. Bar is closed from Tue 17 Mar 2020 until Wed 01 Apr 2020
Sauna is closed from Tue 17 Mar 2020 until Wed 01 Apr 2020
Spa/wellness centre is closed from Tue 17 Mar 2020 until Wed 01 Apr 2020
Hot tub/jacuzzi is closed from Tue 17 Mar 2020 until Wed 01 Apr 2020

Description:
Located in Võru, Guesthouse Mõisa Ait offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 32 LCD TV with satellite channels. Free private parking is available on site.

The rooms of the Mõisa Ait feature a simple interior décor, and each one includes a private bathroom with a shower. All are heated and have a wooden parquet floor.

The ground floor is occupied by a pub, which serves international cuisine, and offers daily specials on workdays. In the summer a patio for 30 people is available.

The Kagu-Keskus shopping centre and the Tamula Beach promenade both are within a 5 minute walk. Võru Central Park is 50 meters from the Mõisa Ait, and the shuttle bus station is within 500 metres. Please inform Guesthouse Mõisa Ait in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform Guesthouse Mõisa Ait in advance.

Description:
Kagu Hostel offers accommodation only 2 km from the beach of Tamula Lake. Guests are welcome to use free Wi-Fi in all areas and the private parking on site.

All rooms at the Kagu are bright and simply furnished. They all have an access to shared bathroom facilities with a shower and some of them feature a TV.

Kagu Hostel provides a common kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a refrigerator and an electric kettle.

The Kagu is located only a 5-minute drive from the picturesque Kreutzwaldi Park. Mount Munamegi is 17 km away. Please inform Kagu Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please let Kagu Hostel know your expected arrival time in advance.

Description:
Located near the original watermill in the Rosma village, Rosma Mill Holiday House offers accommodation in the picturesque, green surroundings. The town of Põlva is 2 km away.

The rooms are spacious and feature wooden floors. Each comes with a well-equipped kitchenette that includes a microwave, a refrigerator and all the necessary kitchenware. Barbecuing facilities are available in the garden.

Guests who like spending their time in an active way can use hiking, cycling and roller skating tracks that are nearby.

The Põlva Lake is 3.5 km away and the town of Võru is 26 km from Rosma Mill Holiday House. Please inform Rosma Mill Holiday House in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Located in a pine forest near the town of Elva, Tartumaa Tervisespordikeskus offers accommodation in rooms and cottages with simple amenities. All offer free Wi-Fi. Free public parking is possible on site.

The Tervisespordikeskus offers simple rooms and cottages that are done in warm pastel colours or have wooden panelling. All rooms are heated and have a work desk, balcony and shared bathroom facilities in the corridors.

The Tartumaa Tervisespordikeskus rents sport equipment and arranges cross country skiing and mini golf. It also boasts its own gym and one of the largest shooting ranges and the longest orienteering courses in Estonia. Guests can also relax in one of the propertys saunas.

Catering can be ordered in advance. Barbecue facilities are also available.

The guest house is located in a quiet remote area. The nearest town, Elva, is within 2.8 km. The nearest airport is within 19 km. Both, Tartu and Otepää are 25 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.

Description:
Verevi Motel in Elva, built with brick nogged timber walls, offers warmly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests are invited to relax in a wooden sauna or have a complimentary breakfast in front of a fireplace.

The Verevi features a terrace, perfect for relaxation in the sun as well as a green garden with barbecue facilities. There also is a free on-site parking.

The surroundings of the picturesque, South Estonian pine forests offer many hiking and cycling possibilities. The hotel runs bicycle rentals and offers poles for Nordic walking and ice skates at a surcharge. The sauna and meeting facilities are availabled at an extra fee.

The motel is only a 2-minute walk away from the Verevi Lake and a 10-minute walk from the town centre of Elva. The Elva Train Station and the bus station are both 1.8 km away. Please inform Verevi Motel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Located in a quiet area 2 km from the town of Elva, Waide Motel offers bright rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV set and a private bathroom with a shower. Free private parking is available on site.

Guests of the Waide have access to a sauna, and can rent a bicycle on site. The motels staff is available 24-hours a day. There also is a bar on site, and in the morning a breakfast buffet  is offered. A designated barbecue area is at guests disposal.

Elva shuttle bus and railway station are within 3.8 km, and the Tartu airport is within a 20 minute car ride. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Waide Motel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Situated in Aakre, just 47 km from University of Tartu Natural History Museum, Sepa Talu features accommodation with a garden, a terrace, barbecue facilities and free WiFi. Boasting free private parking, the country house is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, skiing and fishing.

The country house consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are available in the country house.

Cycling is possible within the area and the country house offers ski storage space.

Tartu Town Hall is 48 km from Sepa Talu, while Tartu Cathedral is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tartu Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Situated in a Vehendi, Vehendi Motell is 800 metres from Lake Võrtsjärv. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and private parking.

Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can have the sauna, which comes with a small pool. The available activities include volleyball and basketball. There is also a playground for children.

Breakfast buffet is served in the mornings, and there is a possibility of ordering other meals.

The town of Rannu is 7 km away, and Rõngu is 14 km from Vehendi Motell. Please inform Külalistemaja Vehendi Motell in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located on the scenic Viimsi Peninsula, the non-smoking Lavendel Spa Hotel is only a 10-minute walk from the beach and a 15-minute drive along the coast from the centre of Tallinn. It offers free use of sauna and Lavendel Spa relaxation centre from 9:00 to 22:00.

Rooms at Lavendel Spa Hotel are classically furnished and offer cable TV. They have a work desk and a bathroom with shower.
Massage and beauty services are available. Lavendel Spa Hotel offers a buffet breakfast, served every day in dining room.

Lavendel Spa Hotel offers free Wi-Fi. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and there is also a luggage storage room. Please inform Lavendel Spa Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Located on the scenic Viimsi Peninsula, a 15-minute drive from Tallinn city centre, Tallinn Viimsi Spa offers a Water Park, wide range of health and beauty treatments, as well as sports activities. Free access to saunas, gym, pool complex and childrens centre is provided.

The Tallinn Viimsi Spa is a highly professional health care centre offering a selection of health and wellness services, as well as relaxing beauty treatments.

Tallinn Viimsi Spa offers free wireless internet access in public areas, as well as free parking. The property also boasts an English-style pub and a modern cinema. Please inform Tallinn Viimsi Spa & Waterpark in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Old Town Hostel offers spacious rooms in the heart of the old town of the famous spa resort of Haapsalu.

Old Town Hostel is located direct across from the Old Town Square next to the Bishops Castle wall, 200 metres from the birdwatching tower. All restaurants and museums are only a short walk away.

The bar, the billiard table and the bowling lanes are available for all guests between 12:00 and 24:00.

The main sights in town are the medieval Episcopal Palace, the Assembly Hall (Kuursaal, built in 1898), and the Promenade (Promenaad), where you can take a scenic walk along the seaside. All sights are only a few steps away from Old Town Hostel. Managed by a private host

Description:
Only a short walk from the centre of the quiet, romantic and cosy resort town of Haapsalu, 100 km from Tallinn, Thalasso Spa Fra Mare lies right by the sea, cooled by the gentle breezes from the surrounding pine forests.

The curative mud, warm winds, wide bays edged with sea grass and streets that lead to the seashore have attracted visitors to Haapsalu since the beginning of the 19th century. The hotel is modern and yet feels just like home.  There is an à la carte restaurant, a lobby bar, spa rooms, the Thalasso Beauty World, the Day Spa sauna and pool complex, a gym and a shop.

The menu in the Bergfeldt restaurant combines tastes from the cuisines of various countries, as well as the best that Estonian cuisine has to offer. Description:
Offering a sauna and a hot tub, Altmõisa Guesthouse is located in Tuuru, 2 km from the Baltic Sea coast and the beach. The property is surrounded by beautiful nature and hiking and cycling trails are available nearby.

The bright and spacious rooms here will provide you with a seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with towels. You can enjoy a sea and a garden view from all the rooms. Extras include a desk.

Breakfast is available every morning and guests can also pre-order other meals. There also is an on-site seasonal café.

At Altmõisa Guesthouse you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and barbecue facilities. The property also organises boat trips. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge. The property offers free parking. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Altmõisa Guesthouse in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free private parking and a playground.

All rooms have sea views and a balcony or a patio. The rooms also offer a TV, a desk, a chair and a private bathroom with a shower, a toilet and a hairdryer.

The hotel features a restaurant with sea views, a bar, a Finnish sauna and a conference room. Please inform Hotel Promenaadi in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Located on the Estonian coastal town of Haapsalu and 100 km from Tallinn, this spa hotel offers different spa treatments. Hotel situated by the lake of Väike Viik and is within a walking distance from the Haapsalu old town. the property offers free Wi-Fi in all public areas

All rooms at Hestia Hotel Haapsalu SPA are equipped with a cable TV, while some rooms also include seating areas and sea views. The rest of the rooms have street view.

The propertys wellness centre include an indoor swimming pool and sauna centre.

Hestia Hotel Haapsalu SPA serves buffet breakfast. The hotel restaurant serves national dishes as well as international cuisine. Please inform Hestia Hotel Haapsalu SPA in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Algallika is a cosy guesthouse in an idyllic location in Western Estonias Matsalu National Park, situated directly on the seaside.

This country house is surrounded by a spacious garden with a large fireplace and a big swing. All rooms were completely renovated in 2008. They are bright, quiet and feature all modern amenities. You can enjoy beautiful views of the garden or the fields from every window. Algallika also has a sauna and a small spa area.

There is over 1 km of private shore available for swimming and sunbathing. The coastline is also ideal for hiking, jogging, horseback riding and rock climbing. Boat trips on Matsalu Bay are also available.

The national park is a famous bird-watching area, being of Europes largest and most important stopping grounds for migratory birds. Guided bird-watching tours are offered.

The Algallika guesthouse is also an ideal place for personal and organisational development trainings or seminars. Transfer from Tallinn Airport possible on request. Please contact the hotel for further information.

Description:
Located in Haapsalu, Päeva Villa is only 120 metres from the Baltic Sea Coast. It offers rooms with a TV set, free Wi-Fi and a telephone. Free private parking is available.

The rooms of the Päeva Villa are bright and feature a classic interior design. All have a work desk and a private bathroom with a shower. Some have a balcony and a view of the bay.

The property has a sauna with a fireplace as well as a designated barbecue area. It also offers a shuttle service at an additional surcharge.

The Päevas restaurant serves Slavic and European cuisine. It also offers packed lunches and room service. In the morning a breakfast buffet is available here.

The central bus station is a 15 minute walk away, and the citys centre is within 1.2 km. Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Description:
Kongo Hotel is located in the Old Town district of the seaside resort Haapsalu, only 200 metres from the shores of the Gulf of Riga. The comfortable rooms are designed in Swedish cottage style.

Free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom are featured in every room.

A bar and a restaurant with a spacious dining area and an open fireplace are available. Local dishes are served. In nice weather guests can enjoy their meals on the sunny terrace.

Hotel Kongo features a sauna and a small indoor pool which are free of charge during the morning.

Haapsalu Castle from the 13th century can be reached within a short walk. The hotel offers free private parking on site. Please inform Kongo Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
HeadLine : In Haeska

Location : With a stay at Haeska Manor in Haeska, you ll be 9.9 mi (15.9 km) from Panga Cliff and 12.7 mi (20.5 km) from Kuuse Ostrich Farm. This hotel is 13 mi (20.9 km) from Ridala Church and 13.2 mi (21.3 km) from Communication Museum.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite at the hotel s coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards

Special Instructions : This property doesn t offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Located in the Old Town of Haapsalu on Estonias West Coast, Hermannuse Maja is right next to the scenic ruins of Haapsalu Castle. The first-floor balcony overlooks the castle walls.

Hermannuse Majas traditionally furnished rooms feature satellite TV, a work desk, and a bathroom with hairdryer.

Estonian dishes are served in the ground-floor café and pub, which features a cosy fireplace. The walls are decorated with periodic exhibitions of photographs and paintings by Estonian artists. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

Free public parking is available at the Hermannuse Maja guesthouse or 50 metres away. Please inform Hermannuse Maja in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Guests arriving after 22:00 are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. This can be noted in the Comments Box during booking or by contacting the hotel using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that the property is located in central area, which features a lot of bars and night life, especially during the summer weekends.

Description:
Located in the centre of Haapsalu, the Sports Centre offers rooms with a TV set and a free internet connection. There is free private parking on site and an indoor swimming pool.

The rooms of the Sports Centre Haapsalu are bright and simple with basic amenities. All are heated and have a private bathroom with a shower.

The guest house is part of a complex that boasts a sauna, fitness centre and a spa and wellness centre. Guests can also enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or relax in the steam bath.

There is a shopping centre within 400 metres.

Description:
Westhouse Retro is located in Haapsalu, in the Old Town. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

It offers rooms with shared bathrooms. There is also a garden with barbecue facilities.

The bathrooms feature a washing machine for all guests to use.

The Bay of Haapsalu is only a 5-minute walk away just like the nearest bus station and a shopping centre. The city centre is 800 metres away and the Tallinn Airport is 108 km away. Description:
Located 1.8 km from Paralepa Beach, Lahe apartment provides accommodation in Haapsalu with access to a sauna. Set 1 km from Vasikaholmi Beach, the property offers a garden and free private parking.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Haapsalu Town Hall, Haapsalu Episcopal Castle and Museum of the Coastal Swedes. The nearest airport is Kärdla Airport, 56 km from Lahe apartment. Please inform Lahe apartment in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Haapsalu Guesthouse is located in Haapsalu. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms will provide you with a terrace and a seating area. You can enjoy sea view and garden view from the room. Extras include bed linen. Most rooms have a private bathroom.

At Haapsalu Guesthouse you will find a garden and barbecue facilities. The property offers free parking.

This country house is 89 km from Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport. Please inform Haapsalu Guesthouse in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Kassimaja Guesthouse is a renovated wooden house built in 1920. This self-catering accommodation located is located a short walk from the centre of Haapsalu. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The apartments are located on the second floor attic and feature a kitchen with a microwave and a refrigerator. Private bathrooms come with a shower and a washing machine. You can enjoy a garden view.

At Kassimaja Guesthouse you will find a garden with barbecue facilities.

It is 500 metres to Haapsalu Bay. Paralepa Beach is 4 km from the property and Rohuküla Harbour is 10 km from Kassimaja Guesthouse. Please inform Kassimaja Guesthouse in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
The apartment is heated with a historic masonry heater oven. Heating should be requested from the owner.

Description:
Villa Marienholm is a self-catering accommodation located in by the Vaike lake in Haapsalu and just a 3-minute walk from the sea beach. Free WiFi access is available.

Each apartment will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a view of either the lake or the sea. The private bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. There is also a full kitchen with a microwave and a refrigerator. Extras include bed linen and towels.

At Villa Marienholm you will find a garden and free parking. Activities in the surrounding area include cycling. Please inform Villa Marienholm in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please inform the property in case you are traveling with children.

Description:
Villa & Restoran Soffa is located in the centre of Haapsalu, 250 metres from the Haapsalu Castle with its surrounding park. It offers elegant air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms, decorated in the shades of beige and brown, will provide you with a TV and cable channels. Bathroom facilities are shared. Extras include linen.

At Villa & Restoran Soffa you will find a restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a game of billiards.

The property is 9.5 km from the Rohuküla Harbour, and 21 km from the Matsalu National Park. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Ritta Holiday Home is located in Haapsalu, within 500 metres from the Haapsalu Castle and 1,5 km away from a sandy beach. This property was renovated using eco-friendly materials and offers a large well-kept garden.

Each room here will provide you with a seating area and a kitchenette complete with a refrigerator and kitchenware. There is also a bath and a shower hose. You can enjoy garden view from the room.

At Guesthouse Ritta you will find a terrace where you can relax. The property offers free private parking and bicycle rental for guests convenience. Nearest supermarkt is 300 metres away and guests receive discounts in Haapalu Eco Store "Allikas".

The beach over Lake Vaike is within a 4-minute walk and a 7-minute walk will take you to a beach over Haapsalu Eeslaht Bay.

Description:
Tamme Hostel offers accommodation in Haapsalu, a 5-minute walk from Haapsalu Old Town and centre. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking in the courtyard is available.

All rooms feature garden view and access to 2 shared bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a shared lounge and kitchen area at guests disposal. They can also relax in the garden or on the propertys terrace.

The nearest airport is Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport, 89 km from Tamme Hostel. Please inform Tamme Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that there is no reception at the property. Check-in after check-in hours is possible only upon previous request or when paid in advance.

Description:
Located in Haapsalu, 1.2 km from Vasikaholmi Beach, Hostel Sport features rooms with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 1.6 km from Grand Holm Marina, 300 metres from Epp Maria Gallery and 600 metres from Haapsalu Kuursaal. The property is allergy-free and is situated 1.9 km from Paralepa Beach.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower and a wardrobe. At the hostel each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Hostel Sport include Haapsalu Town Hall, Haapsalu Episcopal Castle and Museum of the Coastal Swedes. The nearest airport is Kärdla Airport, 56 km from the accommodation. Please inform Hostel Sport in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Haapsalu Kutsehariduskeskuse hostel is located 3 km from the city centre and offers simple rooms with free wired internet access. Guests can use a gym free of charge, as well as cook in the common kitchen.

Kutsehariduskeskuse hostel offers a 24-hour front desk service. There is a sauna available at surcharge, as well as a washing machine for visitors use.

Haapsalu Kutsehariduskeskuse hostel is situated 4 km from the beach and features free private parking. The nearest bus stop is 30 metres away. Please inform Haapsalu Kutsehariduskeskuse hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Situated in the historical centre of Haapsalu, Hapsal Dietrich apartemendid features a view to the bishop castle and the clock tower. Free private parking is available on site. There is also an on-site cafe.

The apartments are brightly decorated with contemporary and natural design, all come with either patio, terrace or balcony. Some apartments are air conditioned and include a seating area with a TV. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher. Towels are provided.

Paralepa sandy beach is 2 km from property. Hapsal Dietrich apartemendid are 90 km from Tallinn and international airport Lennart Meri. Rohuküla harbor is 10 km from Haapsalu and Virtsu harbour is 75 km away. Please inform Hapsal Dietrich apartemendid in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Upon request guests can pay in advance by a bank transfer.

Description:
Lapmanni apartments offers accommodation in Haapsalu.

Located on the ground floor, apartments feature open living, dining and kitchen areas, a flat-screen TV, King or twin bedding configurations. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower in every unit. Bed linen is available.

Free use of bicycles is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling. The nearest airport is Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport, 89 km from the property. Please inform Lapmanni apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
